bio: I am a crypto enthusiast and a believer in optimistic values. I created an optimistic collective content education community for Chinese users
contributionDescription: I created and operated an optimistic collective content education community website for 1.3 billion potential Chinese users. I translated and wrote more than 30 articles related to Optimism and public goods funding, and spread the core values of Optimism to tens of thousands of Chinese crypto users. Five offline gatherings on Optimism were held, with nearly 200 people participating in discussions on Optimism and public goods funding ideas.
impactDescription: As a communicator, in the Chinese user area, do your best to promote and disseminate information about Optimism technology, ecosystem, governance processes and public products online and offline to promote the adoption of Optimism. In a market with 1.3 billion potential users, we took the first step with the Optimism FM website, spread and influenced tens of thousands of Chinese users to pay attention to Optimism, and successfully gathered and attracted nearly 200 Chinese users to participate in depth. .
